    • Method Detail

      • addOrUpdateThemeDescriptor

        public ThemeDescriptorResponse addOrUpdateThemeDescriptor(Long accountId,
                                                 String appKey,
                                                 Long themeDescriptorId,
                                                 String title,
                                                 String description,
                                                 Boolean publicRead,
                                                 Boolean publicWrite,
                                                 Boolean publicDelete,
                                                 Boolean publicAdd,
                                                 Enums.Visibility visibility,
                                                 List<Long> connectionIdsToAdd,
                                                 List<Long> connectionGroupIdsToAdd,
                                                 Boolean includeFriendGroup,
                                                 AppVersion appVersion,
                                                 String colorValueJson,
                                                 String stringReplacerJson,
                                                 String customJsonObjects,
                                                 String iconImageFilePath,
                                                 String sceneAtlasImageFilePath,
                                                 String bgImageFilePath,
                                                 String bgSoundFilePath,
                                                 String musicSelection,
                                                 Boolean completeWithDefaultValues,
                                                 String locationDescription,
                                                 Location location)
                                                   throws SirqulException
        Creates or updates a theme descriptor that can be used to give applications a customized look and feel. The theme can be created by consumers and shared to other users, allowing them to use and/or collaborate on making the theme.

        Target API Endpoint: /consumer/theme
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account ID of the user (deviceId or accountId required, deviceId added automatically)
        appKey - the application key. Maps to "gameType".
        themeDescriptorId - the theme descriptor id used to update an existing theme, leave empty for creating a new theme
        title - the title of the theme
        description - the description of the theme
        publicRead - determines whether the theme's participants have read permissions
        publicWrite - determines whether the theme's participants have write permissions
        publicDelete - determines whether the theme's participants have delete permissions
        publicAdd - determines whether the theme's participants have add permissions
        visibility - the determines the theme's participants (PUBLIC - includes everyone in the system as a potential participant, PRIVATE - only considers people who have been invited as participants)
        connectionIdsToAdd - a comma separated list of connection IDs to share to users
        connectionGroupIdsToAdd - a comma separated list of connection group IDs to share to groups
        includeFriendGroup - flag to determine whether to share to the user's "friends" group
        appVersion - the application version the theme was created for. AppVersion
        colorValueJson - a json array used to replace colors withing the application
        Example : [ {"name": "sceneAtlas", "valueString": "100,100,100,255"}, {"name": "bg","valueString": "100,100,100,255"} ]
        stringReplacerJson - a json array used to replace strings within the application
        Example: [ {"name" : "coins", "valueString" : "Gems" }, {"name" : "lives", "valueString" : "lives" } ]
        customJsonObjects - a json object used by the scene atlas to position sprites
        Example: { "pShootingOffset": [ { "name": "x", "valueString": "2.2" }, { "name": "y", "valueString": "-0.3" } ], "e1ShootingOffset": [ { "name": "x", "valueString": "0.25" }, { "name": "y", "valueString": "0.5" } ] }
        iconImageFilePath - the icon image file path containing the image used as the theme icon
        sceneAtlasImageFilePath - the scene atlas image file path containing the scene atlas
        bgImageFilePath - the bg image file path containing the background image
        bgSoundFilePath - the bg sound file path containing the background sound file (preferably in MP3 format)
        musicSelection - used to select a default sound file that already exists in the application
        completeWithDefaultValues - determines whether to use default values to complete the theme
        locationDescription - the description of the user's current location
        location - the current location of the user
        Returns:
        a ThemeDescriptorResponse on valid response, or SirqulResponse with error message.
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • getThemeDescriptor

        public PurchaseItemListResponse getThemeDescriptor(Long accountId,
                                          String appKey,
                                          Long themeDescriptorId,
                                          Location location)
                                            throws SirqulException
        Gets a theme

        Target API Endpoint: /consumer/theme/get.
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account ID of the user (deviceId or accountId required, deviceId added automatically)
        appKey - the application key. Maps to "gameType".
        themeDescriptorId - the theme id
        location - the location used to update the user's current location
        Returns:
        PurchaseItemListResponse on valid response, or SirqulResponse with error message.
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

        public SirqulResponse regenerateThemeDescriptor()
                                         throws SirqulException
        Regenerate theme descriptor.

        Target API Endpoint: /consumer/theme/regenerate
        Returns:
        a SirqulResponse with a message of success or fail
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

                                   String appKey,
                                   Long themeDescriptorId,
                                   Location location)
                                     throws SirqulException
        Removes a game theme.

        Target API Endpoint: /consumer/theme/remove
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required, deviceId added automatically)
        appKey - the application key. Maps to "gameType".
        themeDescriptorId - the theme id
        location - the location used to update the user's current location
        Returns:
        a SirqulResponse with a message of success or fail
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • searchThemeDescriptors

        public PurchaseItemListResponse searchThemeDescriptors(Long accountId,
                                              String appKey,
                                              String contestType,
                                              Long ownerId,
                                              String keyword,
                                              List<Enums.Ownership> filters,
                                              Enums.ThemeDescriptorApiMap sortField,
                                              Boolean descending,
                                              Integer start,
                                              Integer limit,
                                              Long dateCreated,
                                              AppVersion appVersion,
                                              Location location)
                                                throws SirqulException
        Searches for game themes.

        Target API Endpoint: /consumer/theme/search
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required, deviceId added automatically)
        appKey - the application key. Maps to "gameType".
        contestType - the contest type
        ownerId - search on contests that an account has access to
        keyword - a keyword to search on
        filters - list of Enums.Ownership
        sortField - the field to sort by. See Enums.ThemeDescriptorApiMap
        descending - determines whether the sorted list is in descending or ascending order
        start - the start parameter for pagination
        limit - the limit parameter for pagination
        dateCreated - filter on items that have been created before this date
        appVersion - application version of the theme to filter by
        location - the location used to update the user's current location
        Returns:
        PurchaseItemListResponse on a valid response, SirqulResponse on an invalid response
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.
